verses.verse: My son, <S%H1121><s%> do not forget <S%H7911><s%> my teaching, <S%H8451><s%> But let your heart <S%H3820><s%> keep <S%H5341><s%> my commandments; <S%H4687><s%>
For length <S%H753><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%> and years <S%H8141><s%> of life, <S%H9132><s%> And peace <S%H7965><s%> they will add <S%H3254><s%> to you.

Do not let kindness <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> leave <S%H5800><s%> you; Bind <S%H7194><s%> them around <S%H5921><s%> your neck, <S%H1621><s%> Write <S%H3789><s%> them on the tablet <S%H3871><s%> of your heart. <S%H3820><s%>
So you will find <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%> repute <S%H7922><s%> In the sight <S%H5869><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> and man. <S%H120><s%>
Trust <S%H982><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> your heart, <S%H3820><s%> And do not lean <S%H8172><s%> on your own understanding. <S%H998><s%>
In all <S%H3605><s%> your ways <S%H1870><s%> acknowledge <S%H3045><s%> Him, And He will make <S%H3474><s%> your paths <S%H734><s%> straight. <S%H3474><s%>
Do not be wise <S%H2450><s%> in your own eyes; <S%H5869><s%> Fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and turn <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> from evil. <S%H9563><s%>
It will be healing <S%H7500><s%> to your body, <S%H8270><s%> And refreshment <S%H8250><s%> to your bones. <S%H6106><s%>
Honor <S%H3513><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> from your wealth, <S%H1952><s%> And from the first <S%H7225><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> your produce; <S%H8393><s%>
So your barns <S%H618><s%> will be filled <S%H4390><s%> with plenty, <S%H7647><s%> And your vats <S%H3342><s%> will overflow <S%H6555><s%> with new <S%H8492><s%> wine. <S%H8492><s%>
My son, <S%H1121><s%> do not reject <S%H3988><s%> the discipline <S%H4148><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Or loathe <S%H6973><s%> His reproof, <S%H9640><s%>
For whom <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> He reproves, <S%H3198><s%> Even as a father, the son <S%H1><s%> in whom he delights. <S%H1121><s%>
How blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H120><s%> who finds <S%H4672><s%> wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> And the man <S%H120><s%> who gains <S%H6329><s%> understanding. <S%H8394><s%>
For its profit <S%H5504><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> the profit <S%H5504><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> And its gain <S%H8393><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> fine gold. <S%H2742><s%>
She is more <S%H4480><s%> precious <S%H3368><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> jewels; <S%H6443><s%> And nothing <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> you desire <S%H2656><s%> compares <S%H9586><s%> with her.
Long <S%H753><s%> life <S%H3117><s%> is in her right <S%H3225><s%> hand; <S%H3225><s%> In her left <S%H8040><s%> hand <S%H8040><s%> are riches <S%H6239><s%> and honor. <S%H9202><s%>
Her ways <S%H1870><s%> are pleasant <S%H5278><s%> ways, <S%H1870><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> her paths <S%H9350><s%> are peace. <S%H7965><s%>
She is a tree <S%H6086><s%> of life <S%H9132><s%> to those who take <S%H2388><s%> hold <S%H2388><s%> of her, And happy <S%H833><s%> are all who hold <S%H8551><s%> her fast. <S%H8551><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> by wisdom <S%H2451><s%> founded <S%H3245><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> By understanding <S%H8394><s%> He established <S%H3559><s%> the heavens. <S%H8064><s%>
By His knowledge <S%H1847><s%> the deeps <S%H8415><s%> were broken <S%H1234><s%> up, And the skies <S%H7834><s%> drip <S%H7491><s%> with dew. <S%H2919><s%>
My son, <S%H1121><s%> let them not depart <S%H3868><s%> from your sight; <S%H5869><s%> Keep <S%H5341><s%> sound <S%H8454><s%> wisdom <S%H8454><s%> and discretion, <S%H4209><s%>
So they will be life <S%H9132><s%> to your soul, <S%H5315><s%> And adornment <S%H2580><s%> to your neck. <S%H1621><s%>
Then <S%H227><s%> you will walk <S%H1980><s%> in your way <S%H1870><s%> securely, <S%H983><s%> And your foot <S%H7272><s%> will not stumble. <S%H5062><s%>
When <S%H518><s%> you lie <S%H7901><s%> down, <S%H7901><s%> you will not be afraid; <S%H6342><s%> When you lie <S%H7901><s%> down, <S%H7901><s%> your sleep <S%H8142><s%> will be sweet. <S%H6149><s%>
Do not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of sudden <S%H6597><s%> fear, <S%H6343><s%> Nor <S%H408><s%> of the onslaught <S%H9585><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> it comes; <S%H935><s%>
For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will be your confidence, <S%H3689><s%> And will keep <S%H8104><s%> your foot <S%H7272><s%> from being caught. <S%H3921><s%>
Do not withhold <S%H4513><s%> good <S%H9185><s%> from those to whom it is due, <S%H1167><s%> When it is in your power <S%H3027><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> [it.]

Do not say <S%H559><s%> to your neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> "Go, <S%H1980><s%> and come <S%H7725><s%> back, <S%H7725><s%> And tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> [it,]" When you have <S%H3426><s%> it with you.
Do not devise <S%H9177><s%> harm <S%H9567><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> your neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> While he lives <S%H3427><s%> in security <S%H983><s%> beside <S%H854><s%> you.
Do not contend <S%H7378><s%> with a man <S%H120><s%> without <S%H2600><s%> cause, <S%H2600><s%> If <S%H518><s%> he has done <S%H1580><s%> you no <S%H3808><s%> harm. <S%H9567><s%>
Do not envy <S%H7065><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of violence, <S%H2555><s%> And do not choose <S%H977><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> of his ways. <S%H1870><s%>
For the crooked <S%H3868><s%> [man] is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> But He is intimate <S%H5475><s%> with the upright. <S%H3477><s%>
The curse <S%H3994><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is on the house <S%H1004><s%> of the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> But He blesses <S%H1288><s%> the dwelling <S%H5116><s%> of the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>
Though <S%H518><s%> He scoffs <S%H9238><s%> at the scoffers, <S%H9238><s%> Yet He gives <S%H5414><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> to the afflicted. <S%H6035><s%>
The wise <S%H2450><s%> will inherit <S%H5157><s%> honor, <S%H9202><s%> But fools <S%H3684><s%> display <S%H7311><s%> dishonor. <S%H7036><s%>
